snippet.title: Answer Knot Trailer (Naraven Games)
snippet.description:
-- A SHORT NARRATIVE ADVENTURE --

Point & click exploration game. 
You follow your wife's journey home through voice messages. But something's happening out there. 
.
.
.
Will be really soon in need of playtesters !  
info@naravengames.com
. 
Follow us everywhere :
https://www.naravengames.com
https://twitter.com/NaravenGames
#answerknot
.
.
Directed by : Julia Jeanneret & Lucie Robert
Voiced by : Maud Laedermann
Music : Greg Terlikowski
